Text_Spanish: No tiene nada del otro mundo

Text_English: I see no reason for doing that
Text_Spanish: No veo razón para hacer eso

Text_English: It looks like a potion with red liquid
Text_Spanish: Parece una poción con líquido rojo

Text_English: This fountain has a strange mechanism inside
Text_Spanish: Esta fuente tiene un extraño mecanismo dentro

Text_English: Hey are you Milito the mighty?
They say you are able to compile with your head
Text_Spanish: Dicen que compilas solo con la mente

Text_English: A potion with unknown effects. What will it serve for?
Text_Spanish: Una poción con efectos desconocidos. Para qué servirá?

Text_English: Finally I knew it served to fill fountain
Text_Spanish: Finalmente descurí que servía para llenar la fuente

Text_English: There was a fountain with a kind of mechanism
Text_Spanish: Había una fuente con algún tipo de mecanismo

Text_English: Maybe some liquid of potion could trigger it
Text_Spanish: Quizá un poco de líquido de poción podría activarlo

Text_English: This mechanism was activated when filling fountain
Text_Spanish: Este mecanismo se activaba cuando la fuente estaba llena
